tool_description: Calculates various conversion rates and funnel metrics from traffic and sales data to measure purchase conversion effectiveness.

page_views.description: Total number of product page views

error_messages: Invalid funnel data: Purchases cannot exceed add_to_cart events, and add_to_cart cannot exceed page_views.
Negative values: All input values must be non-negative integers or numbers.
Zero traffic: Page views and unique visitors must be greater than zero for meaningful conversion calculation.
Data inconsistency: Revenue must be positive when purchases are greater than zero.
usage: Provide page_views, unique_visitors, add_to_cart, purchases, and revenue data. The tool calculates multiple conversion rates across the sales funnel.

average_order_value.description: Revenue divided by number of purchases

revenue_per_visitor.description: Total revenue divided by unique visitors
